users.about: Creator of Data4America: an open source 501(c) data initiative bringing the data sciences to the study of politics.
users.name: data4america

description:
Data4America is a 501(c)(3) bringing data science and data visualization to the study of politics in a crowdsourced and non-partisan way. 

How It Works: Anyone can submit a data visualization, data model, or infographic to Data4America. 

The non-partisan Editorial Board evaluates the community-sourced data journalism based upon its math integrity and data authority. Creators of selected content units receive stipends. The content is also promoted throughout social media and syndication partners. 

It's data science greets politics! http://data4america.org
name: data4america
title: Data4America
